titles.title: Recognizing Linemen, the profession of Linemen, and the contributions of these brave men and women to protect public safety, and expressing support for designation of April 18, 2013, as National Lineman Appreciation Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 1/14/2013--Introduced. Recognizes the efforts of linemen in keeping the electrical power on and protecting public safety. Supports designation of National Linemen Appreciation Day.
